item.title: Resources
item.description: Data Science Thinking https://medium.com/@d_spiegel [Articles] R programming http://r4ds.had.co.nz/ [Free online Book] Python programming https://jakevdp.github.io/PythonDataScienceHandbook/ [Free online Book] Other https://www.datascienceatthecommandline.com/ [Free online Book]

item.title: Events
item.description: Data Science in Practice @FCUL This time DSup brings you a full-day event! An informal and relaxed event, sharing stories from different speakers, to help students in the transition from academia into their professional life. Find more about this project on our webpage and save your spot for this amazing joint meetup!
